Class WorkspaceService

java.lang.Object
  com.compendium.core.datamodel.services.Service
      com.compendium.core.datamodel.services.ClientService
          com.compendium.core.datamodel.services.WorkspaceService
All Implemented Interfaces:
IClientService, IService, IWorkspaceService, java.io.Serializable
public class WorkspaceService
extends ClientService
implements IWorkspaceService, java.io.Serializable

The interface for the WorkspaceService class The Workspace service class provides remote services to manipuate Workspace objects.

Author:
Michelle Bachler

Method Detail

createWorkspace

public boolean createWorkspace(PCSession session,
                               java.lang.String sWorkspaceID,
                               java.lang.String sUserID,
                               java.lang.String sName,
                               java.util.Vector vtViews)
                        throws java.sql.SQLException
Adds a new workspace and returns it if successful.

Specified by:
createWorkspace in interface IWorkspaceService
Parameters:
PCSession - session, the PCSession object for the database to use.
String - sWorkspaceID, the workspace id of the workspace to be created.
String - sUserID, the user id of the user creating this workspace.
String - sName, the name of this workspace.
Vector - vtViews, a list of View object composing this workspace.
Returns:
boolean, true if the creation of the workspace record was successful, else false.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException
